author: Emma Powell
title: Katie Price praised for being 'real' as she shops in Poundland after Katie Hopkins feud

organizations.name: poundland instagram/ katie price  katie price

text:
Katie Price praised for being ‘real’ as she shops in Poundland after Katie Hopkins feud 
The former glamour model browsed the aisles for a bargain as she modelled her new coat Monday 16 January 2017 10:01 BST Click to followES Entertainment Bagging a bargain: Katie Price browses the aisles in Poundland Instagram/ Katie Price 
Katie Price may have made her fortune as a glamour model - but she hasn't let fame go to her head. 
Price, 38, was praised by fans for being a “real” woman after she posted an Instagram picture of herself grabbing a bargain in Poundland . 
The mother-of-five modelled a new coat as she browsed the toiletries aisle with a basket at a branch of the popular shop. 
Alongside a picture of herself she wrote: “Loving my @bobbi_parka new coat and yes I'm in the pound shop with pound shop queen @loupudd.” 
She posted another shot, which she captioned: “Love my @bobbi_parka pound shop today Harrods tomorrow that's how I roll.” A photo posted by Katie Price (@officialkatieprice) on Jan 15, 2017 at 7:37am PST A photo posted by Katie Price (@officialkatieprice) on Jan 15, 2017 at 8:42am PST 

Price was praised by fans with one commenting: “Love that you are in a pound shop. Just shows you have all that money but you have stayed humble.” 
Another posted: “Reason why I love you!!! Normal and down to earth! Comfortable equally anywhere!!!” 
A third wrote: “It shows you're a real person (sic).” Weird and wonderful outfits of Katie Price - In pictures Weird and wonderful outfits of Katie Price - In pictures 1/16 Back to school

Others took the opportunity to make jokes at the expense of her ex-husband Peter Andre with one commenting: “I think Peter Andre's autobiography is on sale there! (sic).” 
The pictures came days after Price became embroiled in a Twitter spat with Katie Hopkins . Katie Price on Loose Women bullying rumours 
Hopkins accused the former glamour model of photoshopping her left arm in a racy photo from her 2017 calendar. 
“Have they photoshopped her left arm back on the wrong way around?,” she tweeted. Read more
